snippet: Heavy scrutiny of young supermodel hopefuls won't surprise many familiar with the business, however, the film illuminates some realities to which even fashion insiders may not be privy.
abstract: Heavy scrutiny of young supermodel hopefuls won't surprise many familiar with the business, however, the film illuminates some realities to which even fashion insiders may not be privy.

headline.main: Documentary Is Another Voice in the Underage Model Conversation
